name: Echochrome Expansion
overview: Compatible with PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita. In order to download and install this product, 52 MB is required. Enter puzzle paradise with this Expansion Pack for echochrome micro, which contains 40 new mazes to challenge your powers of visual perception. Guide the mysterious Walker around each of the 3D levels on the hunt for ‘Echoes’. But beware: chasms, launch-pads and dead ends block the path, rendering your quest impossible… or so it may seem. In fact, by changing the angle at which you view the action, you can remove obstacles and create new paths for the Walker to follow. It’s marvellously mind-bending stuff and great fun for all ages – and with this Expansion Pack, you can go on exercising your imagination even longer. Download it today and put your brain to the ultimate test! Reminder: in order to use this download, you need to own echochrome micro. NOTE: this information was correct at the time of publication. Full Game Support 1 Player; Memory Stick Duo™ Compatible: 1408KB minimum, Wireless Compatible (Ad Hoc Mode)
